alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MONONGALIA... NORTHWESTERN TUCKER...PRESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, radar indicated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Accident to Lumberport. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Terra Alta, Rowlesburg, Pleasant Valley, Newburg, Reedsville, Albright, Tunnelton, Hannahsville, Elgon, Cranesville, and Silver Lake. This includes Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 130 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
